channel.title: Very Urgent!
channel.description: ok i compile my server and it works fine i run it and it says its up but i get this message: [code=java]Eception in threan "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExceptions: 2 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:124) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:30)[/code] and you connect to server but right when u get on you get kicked off and it says u already logged in how i fix, please hurry i got people waiting.

item.title: Very Urgent!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Jeremy368, post:8, topic:261149”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=344859.msg2659977#msg2659977 date=1234122122]
When you edited a .cfg file, probably shops.cfg, you used spaces instead of tabs.
[/quote]
I read this atleast twice a day…[/quote]
Because it’s true. XD
